name: Move
description:
Move within one range band (Close Range).

While moving, if you do any actions you will take a -1 to all rolls because of it.

name: Sprint
description:
Sprint up to two range bands (Medium Range) at a blistering pace.

You can do actions while sprinting, but not too well. you suffer a -2 to all actions while sprinting with some exceptions

name: Flank
description:
Move to flank someone. 

 When flanking, it needs to be declared in advance. As such, you suffer a malus depending on distance travelled to all actions done while flanking per movement rules. However- when flanking a target or a piece of cover, you negate any cover bonuses they may have. 

To determine if a target is being flanked, draw imaginary lines from the hexe faces of adjacent cover. If the shooter is in hexes behind those lines, then they are considered being flanked.
